_sat_cpu Struct Reference

The emulated Saturn CPU as a memory area in ARM domain. More...

#include <saturn.h>

Detailed Description

The emulated Saturn CPU as a memory area in ARM domain. 

typedef

struct _sat_cpu {
        
        unsigned int    Read[257];
        unsigned int    Write[257];
        unsigned char   unknown_data[260];
        unsigned int    A;
        unsigned int    Ah;
        unsigned int    B;
        unsigned int    Bh;
        unsigned int    C;
        unsigned int    Ch;
        unsigned int    D;
        unsigned int    Dh;
        
        unsigned int    R0;
        unsigned int    R0h;
        unsigned int    R1;
        unsigned int    R1h;
        unsigned int    R2;
        unsigned int    R2h;
        unsigned int    R3;
        unsigned int    R3h;
        unsigned int    R4;
        unsigned int    R4h;
        
        unsigned int    D0;
        unsigned int    D1;
        unsigned int    P;
        unsigned int    ST;
        unsigned int    HST;
        unsigned int    CARRY;
        unsigned int    DECIMAL_MODE;
        
} SAT_CPU, *SAT_PCPU;
